org.apache.flink.runtime.webmonitor

接口 RestfulGateway

  • 所有超级接口:
    RpcGateway
    所有已知子接口:
    DispatcherGateway, JobManagerGateway
    所有已知实现类:
    AkkaJobManagerGateway, Dispatcher, StandaloneDispatcher

    public interface RestfulGateway
extends RpcGateway
    Gateway for restful endpoints.

    Gateways which implement this method run a REST endpoint which is reachable under the returned address.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<ClusterOverview> requestClusterOverview(Time timeout)
      Requests the cluster status overview.
      java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<AccessExecutionGraph> requestJob(JobID jobId, Time timeout)
      Requests the AccessExecutionGraph for the given jobId.
      java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<MultipleJobsDetails> requestJobDetails(boolean includeRunning, boolean includeFinished, Time timeout)
      Requests job details currently being executed on the Flink cluster.
      java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.util.Collection<java.lang.String>> requestMetricQueryServicePaths(Time timeout)
      Requests the paths for the MetricQueryService to query.
      java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.lang.String> requestRestAddress(Time timeout)
      Requests the REST address of this RpcEndpoint.
      java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.util.Collection<Tuple2<ResourceID,java.lang.String>>> requestTaskManagerMetricQueryServicePaths(Time timeout)
      Requests the paths for the TaskManager's MetricQueryService to query.

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.apache.flink.runtime.rpc.RpcGateway

        getAddress, getHostname

    • 方法详细资料

      • requestRestAddress

        java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.lang.String> requestRestAddress(Time timeout)
        Requests the REST address of this RpcEndpoint.
        参数:
        timeout - for this operation
        返回:
        Future REST endpoint address

      • requestJob

        java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<AccessExecutionGraph> requestJob(JobID jobId,
                                                                        Time timeout)
        Requests the AccessExecutionGraph for the given jobId. If there is no such graph, then the future is completed with a FlinkJobNotFoundException.
        参数:
        jobId - identifying the job whose AccessExecutionGraph is requested
        timeout - for the asynchronous operation
        返回:
        Future containing the AccessExecutionGraph for the given jobId, otherwise FlinkJobNotFoundException

      • requestJobDetails

        java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<MultipleJobsDetails> requestJobDetails(boolean includeRunning,
                                                                              boolean includeFinished,
                                                                              Time timeout)
        Requests job details currently being executed on the Flink cluster.
        参数:
        includeRunning - true if running jobs shall be included, otherwise false
        includeFinished - true if finished jobs shall be included, otherwise false
        timeout - for the asynchronous operation
        返回:
        Future containing the job details

      • requestClusterOverview

        java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<ClusterOverview> requestClusterOverview(Time timeout)
        Requests the cluster status overview.
        参数:
        timeout - for the asynchronous operation
        返回:
        Future containing the status overview

      • requestMetricQueryServicePaths

        java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.util.Collection<java.lang.String>> requestMetricQueryServicePaths(Time timeout)
        Requests the paths for the MetricQueryService to query.
        参数:
        timeout - for the asynchronous operation
        返回:
        Future containing the collection of metric query service paths to query

      • requestTaskManagerMetricQueryServicePaths

        java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.util.Collection<Tuple2<ResourceID,java.lang.String>>> requestTaskManagerMetricQueryServicePaths(Time timeout)
        Requests the paths for the TaskManager's MetricQueryService to query.
        参数:
        timeout - for the asynchronous operation
        返回:
        Future containing the collection of instance ids and the corresponding metric query service path
